rules_text:
Trample, ward {2}  [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}{G} and exile a legendary card from a graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Alessa, then create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with “When this creature attacks, it gains deathtouch until end of turn”.
